name: Panda Escape
description:
You play as a poor little panda trapped in a bamboo forest while it's on fire, escape the flames, but you'll need the energy to continue, make sure to eat all the bamboo you can!

Controls
A and D / Left and Right - Movement
W / Up - Jump

Pause behind the bamboo stalks and the panda will begin to munch
The more full you are the faster the panda will move
Can you escape the Forrest before the Fire consumes it all?

Version 1.1 - Fixed Windows launching bug

Version 1.2 - Added slight delay to flames
